name: PLANET Planungsgruppe Energie und Technik GbR
goal:
PLANET is an engineering and consultancy company based in Germany and working in the areas of
- energy efficiency
- renewable energies
- energy storage
- fuel cells and fuel cell applications & employment
- hydrogen production and hydrogen applications & employment
- life cycle analysis
- environmental impact analysis
interests: Climate Action, Education, Energy, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: We contribute to the planning of the Work Programmes in the FCH JU, and follow developments in H2020
